description: B.L. Ranji Vs. Chairman, Land Reclamation and Development Co- Operation - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J before  Unless a valid permit or written authority issued by the State, no person is entitled to occupy State land
parties: B.L. Ranji Vs. Chairman, Land Reclamation and Development Co- Operation - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J
judgement_by: Unless a valid permit or written authority issued by the State, no person is entitled to occupy State land
